text:
problems, I designed this book to highlight the areas where deep learning methods may show
the most promise. Deep learning may be the future of complex and challenging time series
forecasting and I think this book will help you get started and make rapid progress on your own
forecasting problems. I hope that you agree and are as excited as I am about the journey ahead.
Jason Brownlee
2018
